infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: StayAfrica needs your location to show nearby properties and experiences.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: StayAfrica uses your location to provide personalized recommendations.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: StayAfrica needs camera access to upload property photos and verify your identity.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: StayAfrica needs photo library access to upload property images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: StayAfrica saves photos to your library for your records.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: StayAfrica can add your booking dates to your calendar for convenience.
